mapper.select: SELECT h.*,img.house_id himg_id,img.image_id,img.image_url FROM (SELECT * FROM (SELECT * FROM tb_house_info h WHERE h.`area_id`=#{areaId} AND h.`status`=1 AND h.`status_auth`=3) h LEFT JOIN (SELECT hsi.house_id hid,hsi.`out_time`,hsi.`out_status`,hsi.new_price FROM tb_house_status hsi) hs ON h.`house_id`=hs.hid AND hs.`out_time`=#{outTime} WHERE IFNULL(hs.`out_status`,1) <> 2 LIMIT 20 ) h LEFT JOIN (SELECT * FROM tb_house_image thi GROUP BY thi.house_id) img ON img.house_id=h.house_id

SELECT h.*,img.house_id himg_id,img.image_id,img.image_url FROM (SELECT * FROM (SELECT * FROM tb_house_info h WHERE h.`area_id`=#{areaId} AND h.`status`=1 AND h.`status_auth`=3) h LEFT JOIN (SELECT hsi.house_id hid,hsi.`out_time`,hsi.`out_status`,hsi.new_price FROM tb_house_status hsi) hs ON h.`house_id`=hs.hid AND hs.`out_time`=#{outTime} WHERE IFNULL(hs.`out_status`,1) <> 2 ORDER BY h.${fieldN} ${condition} LIMIT 20 )h LEFT JOIN (SELECT * FROM tb_house_image thi GROUP BY thi.house_id) img ON img.house_id=h.house_id

SELECT h.*,img.house_id himg_id,img.image_id,img.image_url FROM (SELECT h.*,hs.*,IFNULL(h.evaluate,0)/h.price hot FROM (SELECT * FROM tb_house_info h WHERE h.`area_id`=#{areaId} AND h.`status`=1 AND h.`status_auth`=3) h LEFT JOIN (SELECT hsi.house_id hid,hsi.`out_time`,hsi.`out_status`,hsi.new_price FROM tb_house_status hsi) hs ON h.`house_id`=hs.hid AND hs.`out_time`=#{outTime} WHERE IFNULL(hs.`out_status`,1) <> 2 ORDER BY hot DESC LIMIT 10 ) h LEFT JOIN (SELECT * FROM tb_house_image thi GROUP BY thi.house_id) img ON img.house_id=h.house_id
SELECT h.*,img.house_id himg_id,img.image_id,img.image_url FROM (SELECT * FROM tb_house_info h WHERE h.house_id=#{houseId}) h LEFT JOIN tb_house_image img ON img.house_id=h.house_id
